text: They are really friendly. Always drop by to drop my parcels and also purchase drinks from them.

Opening hours are stated from 11am on google and shopee but its not happening. Even though I did ask the shopkeeper what time they open and she said 11am, but in all honesty their workers are always late by a large margin.
Staff is always friendly so I like coming here!

Indeed as previous reviewer said, opening hours is not accurate.

I requested the owner to update it on Google but she insists that Shopee delivery SMS gave the right opening hours (which is true)

This is still not a fair reason to other customers who arenâ€™t from Shopee.

Sharing their opening hours here:
Monday 12:00-22:00
Tuesday 12:00-22:00
Wednesday 12:00-22:00
Thursday 12:00-22:00
Friday 12:00-22:00
Saturday 13:00-22:00
Sunday 13:00-22:00

Why complain about the hours when you can send the correct hours to google and they will fix it - i have fixed many addresses, pin points and hours, you don't have to be the owner to fix business hours ðŸ™„. Do something instead of  whining thanks
